## DetailedFailure.onSuccess() method

Propagates the error message and detail from this result.

**Signature:**

```typescript
onSuccess<TN>(__cb: DetailedSuccessContinuation<T, TD, TN>): DetailedResult<TN, TD>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  \_\_cb | [DetailedSuccessContinuation](./ts-utils.detailedsuccesscontinuation.md)<!-- -->&lt;T, TD, TN&gt; |  |

**Returns:**

[DetailedResult](./ts-utils.detailedresult.md)<!-- -->&lt;TN, TD&gt;

A new [DetailedFailure&lt;TN, TD&gt;](./ts-utils.detailedfailure.md) which contains the error message and detail from this one.

## Remarks

Mutates the success type as the success callback would have, but does not call the success callback.
